name: SmartSlydr
0:
”Alexa, set Door 50 percent”
”Alexa, open the Window”
”Alexa, close Door”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.

des:
Control the Smart Door and Window opener from LycheeThings. Open or Close the door or set them to desired percentage. Now with this skill also enable or disable the tags or set the schedule via Alexa routines.

Users can use the Skill as per the instruction below.
- Open the Alexa app 
- Click Skills and then search and enable “SmartSlydr” skill. 
- Then log in using LycheeThings Account and click Authorize. 
- Finally tap ‘Discover Device’ to discover all devices under your LycheeThings Account that can be controlled by Alexa.

You can find detailed information about Alexa setup at https://youtu.be/E0s6mXGbTcI
The SmartSlydr Automatic Sliding Door is the ultimate smart pet door that works seamlessly with Alexa voice assistance.
